body:
+1 

please add JIRA num to PR title and use a more clearly commit message. It's enhancement for comments instead of code logical fix.
Please make this pr bound to the issue.

Great to have the fix for DirectoryIterator! The fix itself looks good. However, you need to follow below process to raise pull request:
1. create an issue in hawq jira: https://issues.apache.org/jira/projects/HAWQ/issues
2. change your commit message to "HAWQ-XXXX. Fix DirectoryIterator" where XXXX is the jira number for the issue you created

Please let me know if you have more questions.
The commit message should be in the format "HAWQ-xxxx. refactor lock implement and fix mem usage bug"
Refer to [here](https://github.com/chiyang10000/hawq/runs/1732690503?check_suite_focus=true) for the run result.

> Maybe the license declaration should be put into the source files?

Sure, we will have another commit to fix this

> +1
> 上一个commit改版本号漏了一位，应该是3.0.0.0

应该是没漏，我看之前的版本那个地方都是三位的。
It is better to create issue for the bug fix and add HAWQ-xxxx to the description

> please squash your commits.

Done. Thank you.
Also you need to file a HAWQ issue, and rename the commit to HAWQ-XXXX. aarch64 port changes

> Also you need to file a HAWQ issue, and rename the commit to HAWQ-XXXX. aarch64 port changes

Hi @ztao1987, thank you. I sent a note to private@hawq.apache.org asking for a JIRA account to be created. Post getting that, I will file a HAWQ issue and modify the commit message.

> I have filed this: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HAWQ-1853.

Thank you very much. I modified the commit message to "HAWQ-1853. aarch64 port changes".
ok, it looks good to me. Will merge it.

> ok, it looks good to me. Will merge it.

Thank you much.
